title: JAM / COALITION WARSHIP ARCHER -- NOID VERSION
description: CUTSCENE where you attempt to contact Coalition Warship Archer with NOID. PART OF THE MORALIST DREAM QUEST

dialogueTree.title: Noid: ""Just plug that in there, would you?""
dialogueTree.text: "Just plug that in there, would you?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's done. I believe we're ready."..."
links.text: "It's done. I believe we're ready." The lieutenant wipes his brow.

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah, as ready as we're going to b..."
links.text: "Yeah, as ready as we're going to be." He cracks his neck before putting on a pair of headphones. "Grab one of these can sets. I've got it rigged so that we can both listen, but only your cop-talk will broadcast..."

links.title: Noid: ""No idea what we're gonna hear when..."
links.text: "No idea what we're gonna hear when I turn this thing on, so be prepared for *anything*. Trick is to keep transmitting your request until the Big Bad acknowledges you. You got that?"

links.title: You: ""Wait, what if they *never* acknowl..."
links.text: "Wait, what if they *never* acknowledge me?"

links.title: Noid: ""Honestly, that might be for the be..."
links.text: "Honestly, that might be for the best. Like I said, the sines coming off this whole project are seriously uncharted..."

links.title: Noid: ""Don't know how much juice we've go..."
links.text: "Don't know how much juice we've got, so we better get to it. You ready?"

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Noid: ""Good. We're live in two... one...""
links.text: "Good. We're live in two... one..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "..."
Shivers: "A soft rustling. The snow seems to..."
links.text: A soft rustling. The snow seems to have gotten between your ears somehow...

links.title: You: "Where's the sound coming from?"
links.text: Where's the sound coming from?

links.title: Shivers: "Every lightswitch, every motor carr..."
links.text: Every lightswitch, every motor carriage, every doorbell, tea kettle, and radio in Martinaise, all mingled with electrical interference caused by scattered thunderstorms over Ozonne.

links.title: Noid: ""Hey, lawman. We're waiting on you.""
links.text: "Hey, lawman. We're waiting on you."

links.title: You: "Ignore it."
links.text: Ignore it.

links.title: Noid: ""That's your cue, lawman.""
links.text: "That's your cue, lawman."

links.title: You: ""What should I say?""
links.text: "What should I say?"

links.title: Noid: ""That's up to you. I don't know you..."
links.text: "That's up to you. I don't know your *callsign*."

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer, this is..."
links.text: "Coalition Warship Archer, this is RCM Officer Firewalker. Please acknowledge."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "..."
Inland Empire: "You're all alone out there, wanderi..."
links.text: You're all alone out there, wandering a blasted heath, calling out to the night, but there is no reply, except for the buzzing of invisible machines...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks up at you with..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks up at you with a nervous glance.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "He is nervous for your sake, of cou..."
links.text: He is nervous for your sake, of course, but also his own.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Looking at him now, with both hands..."
links.text: Looking at him now, with both hands on his headphones, you see very briefly what the lieutenant must have been like when he first joined the RCM...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Then he turns to you. He gives you..."
links.text: Then he turns to you. He gives you a half smile along with an almost imperceptible nod of encouragement.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Then he turns to you. His expressio..."
links.text: Then he turns to you. His expression seems to say, 'You'd better not leave this mess for me alone'.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Then he turns to you. He shakes his..."
links.text: Then he turns to you. He shakes his head slightly and looks back at the amplifier.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Nervous for who, though, you cannot..."
links.text: Nervous for who, though, you cannot say.

links.title: Noid: ""Give it another go.""
links.text: "Give it another go."

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer, this is..."
links.text: "Coalition Warship Archer, this is Firewalker. Please acknowledge."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "..."
Perception (Hearing): "Perhaps you're simply imagining it,..."
links.text: Perhaps you're simply imagining it, but it seems as though you're learning to pull apart the fibres of this auditory felt. You focus on one strand in particular, one that sounds very nearly human...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Nein, Liebling! Das lasse ich nich..."
links.text: "Nein, Liebling! Das lasse ich nicht zu … Wie kannst du unseren Jungen bloß auf einem dieser *Dinger* nach Vredefort schicken?"

links.title: You: ""Hello... Archer? Do you acknowledg..."
links.text: "Hello... Archer? Do you acknowledge?"

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Marianne ... mir erzählt, dass Osk..."
links.text: "Marianne ... mir erzählt, dass Oskar nicht mehr ... seit er auf einem Luftschiff aus Graad zurückgekommen ... halten ihn die Psychologen für vollkommen normal ... aber sie hat das Gefühl ... seit seiner Rückkehr ... einem Fremden zusammenzuleben..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Something about her son going to Vr..."
links.text: Something about her son going to Vredefort on an aerostatic... to see some psychologists? Or maybe the psychologists are saying it's normal... to have feelings for strangers? Foreign languages were never your strong suit.

links.title: You: "What does this remind me of?"
links.text: What does this remind me of?

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "The rustling of dry autumn leaves...."
links.text: The rustling of dry autumn leaves. Waves breaking at a distance. A thousand wings beating at once.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's just like that woman in the el..."
links.text: It's just like that woman in the electronic doorbell... the circuit ghost...

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's strangely comforting to think..."
links.text: It's strangely comforting to think of these voices travelling through the air, until you capture them, firefly-like, with your little metal antenna...

links.title: You: ""Noid, I think we're getting some e..."
links.text: "Noid, I think we're getting some entroponetic crosstalk."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einz..."
links.text: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen."

links.title: Noid: ""Is that what you call those radio-..."
links.text: "Is that what you call those radio-spookers? Didn't know they had a *technical* name..."

links.title: Noid: ""Either way, you gotta keep it up t..."
links.text: "Either way, you gotta keep it up till we get through."

links.title: You: ""Noid, I think there are ghosts in..."
links.text: "Noid, I think there are ghosts in this radio."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einz..."
links.text: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen."

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah, sounds like some radio-spook..."
links.text: "Yeah, sounds like some radio-spookers, alright. That's what happens when you get down in the mega-low range. You better keep trying anyway..."

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer, this is..."
links.text: "Coalition Warship Archer, this is Firewalker. If you're there, Archer, please acknowledge."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "..."
Noid: ""Again.""
links.text: "Again."

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer, this is..."
links.text: "Coalition Warship Archer, this is Firewalker. Do you acknowledge?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's cold now...""
links.text: "It's cold now..."

links.title: Shivers: "A slight frisson at the point where..."
links.text: A slight frisson at the point where your neck meets your spine. Something about the lieutenant's words, directed at you, but not *you*...

links.title: You: ""Kim, don't clog my connection.""
links.text: "Kim, don't clog my connection."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I didn't say anything, detective.""
links.text: "I didn't say anything, detective."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...someone has been maintaining it..."
links.text: "...someone has been maintaining it. The wiring has been repaired..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "An uncomfortable silence falls over..."
links.text: An uncomfortable silence falls over the connection.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... It's been a long winter... Lon..."
links.text: "... It's been a long winter... Long and cold..."

links.title: You: ""Are you going to tell me you didn'..."
links.text: "Are you going to tell me you didn't say *that*, either?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I promise you, I didn't, even thou..."
links.text: "I promise you, I didn't, even though it certainly *sounds* like me..." The lieutenant seems to wince at the sound of his own voice.

links.title: You: ""It must be entroponetic crosstalk...."
links.text: "It must be entroponetic crosstalk. It's the only explanation."

links.title: Noid: ""So your partner's haunting himself..."
links.text: "So your partner's haunting himself. Trying to warn him off his current path, most like."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's eerie, for certain, but also..."
links.text: "It's eerie, for certain, but also harmless. I just wish I could remember what I was talking about..."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Something here is eating at the lie..."
links.text: Something here is eating at the lieutenant, as much as he would like to move past it.

links.title: Logic: "Hold on, isn't the pale supposed to..."
links.text: Hold on, isn't the pale supposed to be thousands of kilometres from here?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Here it is again, this pale... If o..."
links.text: Here it is again, this pale... If only you knew more about it.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Pale? Pale-pale-pale... Seems to be..."
links.text: Pale? Pale-pale-pale... Seems to be missing from your records.

links.title: You: ""What is happening?""
links.text: "What is happening?"

links.title: Noid: ""Sounds like your partner's being h..."
links.text: "Sounds like your partner's being haunted by his past self. Or maybe he's trying to warn himself, from the future, most like. I don't know much about radios."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's just a little bit of pale int..."
links.text: "It's just a little bit of pale interference, detective. A little *eerie*, perhaps, but perfectly explicable..."

links.title: Composure: "Outwardly, the lieutenant exudes re..."
links.text: Outwardly, the lieutenant exudes reassurance, but you can sense a lingering doubt in his voice.

links.title: You: ""Maybe it's your twin brother?""
links.text: "Maybe it's your twin brother?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can assure you, it's not my 'twi..."
links.text: "I can assure you, it's not my 'twin brother'. Though it certainly does *sound* like me..." The lieutenant seems to wince at the sound of his own voice.

links.title: You: ""What are you talking about, Kim? I..."
links.text: "What are you talking about, Kim? It's perfectly nice out."

links.title: You: ""It's really coming down, now that..."
links.text: "It's really coming down, now that you mention it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mention what?""
links.text: "Mention what?"

links.title: You: ""It's cold, like you just said.""
links.text: "It's cold, like you just said."

links.title: Shivers: "A slight frisson at the point where..."
links.text: A slight frisson at the point where your neck meets your spine. You can *feel* the lieutenant's presence, even though he's nowhere to be found...

links.title: You: ""Kim? How did you get on my connect..."
links.text: "Kim? How did you get on my connection?"

links.title: Noid: ""Whoa, the cop's *own partner* is a..."
links.text: "Whoa, the cop's *own partner* is a radio-spooker. That's some *other core* business right there..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "..."
Kim Kitsuragi: ""...someone has been maintaining it..."
links.text: "...someone has been maintaining it. The wiring has been repaired..."

links.title: You: ""Kim! Answer me.""
links.text: "Kim! Answer me."

links.title: Noid: ""No use, man. Don't think he can he..."
links.text: "No use, man. Don't think he can hear you."

links.title: You: ""I've encountered this before. It's..."
links.text: "I've encountered this before. It's entroponetic crosstalk. This is a piece of the past mixing in with our signal."

links.title: Noid: ""What...""
links.text: "What..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's been a long winter... Long an..."
links.text: "It's been a long winter... Long and cold."

links.title: Noid: ""What have you gotten us into, lawm..."
links.text: "What have you gotten us into, lawman?"

links.title: Half Light: "Just *run*. Unplug that headset and..."
links.text: Just *run*. Unplug that headset and get as far away as you can.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Natürlich halten ihn die Psycholog..."
links.text: "Natürlich halten ihn die Psychologen für vollkommen normal..."

links.title: You: ""Roy said this transceiver came wit..."
links.text: "Roy said this transceiver came with some kind of *signal purifier*. Maybe we should turn that on?"

links.title: Noid: ""Is that what this switch does? I'l..."
links.text: "Is that what this switch does? I'll flip it now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... someone has been maintaining i..."
links.text: "... someone has been maintaining it..." The lieutenant's voice suddenly grows faint and distant, as though he were speaking from a passing motor carriage...

links.title: Noid: ""Sounds like the de-spooker worked...."
links.text: "Sounds like the de-spooker worked. Lucky break. Now give it another go."

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer. Do you a..."
links.text: "Coalition Warship Archer. Do you acknowledge? This is Firewalker."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "..."
Horseback Antenna: ""... Warship Archer. Are you there,..."
links.text: "... Warship Archer. Are you there, Firewalker? Please acknowledge."

links.title: You: ""Archer! This is Firewalker. Can yo..."
links.text: "Archer! This is Firewalker. Can you hear me?"

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "..."
Noid: ""Bad news." The speedfreak removes..."
links.text: "Bad news." The speedfreak removes his sweat-drenched headphones. "Even with the de-spooker flipped, the signal is still too weak to get down with..."

links.title: You: ""What can we do?""
links.text: "What can we do?"

links.title: Noid: ""Don't know. If we can't get around..."
links.text: "Don't know. If we can't get around the interference, we're in deep trouble. Hold on, I think Egg gave me some kind of checklist..."

links.title: Noid: ""Hmmm. Says here, 'MAIN STEP: VOLUM..."
links.text: "Hmmm. Says here, 'MAIN STEP: VOLUME TO THE MAX'... That's not too helpful. Okay, it also says: 'INSPECT CONNECTIONS FOR HARD CORE CLARITY,' so let's try that..."

links.title: You: ""How am I supposed to inspect the c..."
links.text: "How am I supposed to inspect the connections?"

links.title: Noid: ""My guess, you climb up the centaur..."
links.text: "My guess, you climb up the centaur-man, see if there's anything obviously *interfering* with them. Maybe you've got some technical law-science?"

links.title: Logic: "This isn't exactly your area of exp..."
links.text: This isn't exactly your area of expertise, though...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... someone has been maintaining i..."
links.text: "... someone has been maintaining it..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "No problem at all. You've already t..."
links.text: No problem at all. You've already teleported up *way* greater heights.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Come on, son. This isn't anything b..."
links.text: Come on, son. This isn't anything but a common high bar! Just get a solid overhand grip and hoist yourself up!

links.title: Inland Empire: "Images of your body smashed against..."
links.text: Images of your body smashed against the pavement flood your mind -- this is *dangerous*.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Something about this set-up seems d..."
links.text: Something about this set-up seems dimly familiar, but you'll be damned if you know what you're supposed to do about it.

links.title: You: ""But I don't know what I'm doing...""
links.text: "But I don't know what I'm doing..."

links.title: Noid: ""It's got to be you. I'm manning th..."
links.text: "It's got to be you. I'm manning the decks down here."

links.title: You: ""No problem. I've already mastered..."
links.text: "No problem. I've already mastered the art of teleportation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You actually haven't. But you have..."
links.text: "You actually haven't. But you have proven that you're a relatively capable climber."

links.title: Noid: ""Then there's no problem, is there?""
links.text: "Then there's no problem, is there?"

links.title: You: ""But what if I slip and fall...""
links.text: "But what if I slip and fall..."

links.title: Noid: ""Maybe you break an arm, maybe you..."
links.text: "Maybe you break an arm, maybe you break your neck. Could go either way, honestly."

links.title: Noid: ""But that's what the invalids' fund..."
links.text: "But that's what the invalids' fund is for, so don't worry about it for now."

links.title: You: ""Okay, let's do this." (Climb the m..."
links.text: "Okay, let's do this." (Climb the monument.)

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "Your gloves give you a solid grip o..."
links.text: Your gloves give you a solid grip on the metal bar. This feels pleasingly familiar...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Keep it together, champ! You've got..."
links.text: Keep it together, champ! You've got this...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "... and before you know it, you're..."
links.text: ... and before you know it, you're safely perched atop the monument.

links.title: You: ""Did you *see* that bar work?""
links.text: "Did you *see* that bar work?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, you're a natural gymnast, det..."
links.text: "Yes, you're a natural gymnast, detective. Now would you like to do what you got up there to do?"

links.title: Noid: ""This cop's got serious crab-like p..."
links.text: "This cop's got serious crab-like properties. Must be some kind of *law-crab*."

links.title: You: ""That was pretty bad. I hope nobody..."
links.text: "That was pretty bad. I hope nobody saw it."

links.title: You: "Examine the connections."
links.text: Examine the connections.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "The connection itself is nothing mo..."
links.text: The connection itself is nothing more than a little braid of exposed wire wrapped about the hoof of the horse, a copper fetter it cannot slip...

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The whole monument is covered in a..."
links.text: The whole monument is covered in a thin but durable layer of oil and grime. It's obvious no one has cleaned it in years.

links.title: Logic: "If you had something *alcoholic*, y..."
links.text: If you had something *alcoholic*, you could dissolve the oils, creating a cleaner (and clearer) connection.

links.title: You: "Pour some alcohol over the connecti..."
links.text: Pour some alcohol over the connections.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Is this really the time, detective?""
links.text: "Is this really the time, detective?"

links.title: Noid: ""It is, it's the time of desperate..."
links.text: "It is, it's the time of desperate measures. He's using his party fuel to clean the connections..."

links.title: Noid: ""Are you partying up there?""
links.text: "Are you partying up there?"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "More than that, you're sacrificing..."
links.text: More than that, you're sacrificing something precious on the altar...

links.title: You: "Clean the connections with the ammo..."
links.text: Clean the connections with the ammonia.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Glad that stuff came in handy afte..."
links.text: "Glad that stuff came in handy after all..."

links.title: Noid: ""Wow, law-science comes through.""
links.text: "Wow, law-science comes through."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "Once the alcohol has had time to di..."
links.text: Once the alcohol has had time to dissolve the oils, you wipe off the bar with your sleeve and reattach the cable.

links.title: You: ""Did that help?""
links.text: "Did that help?"

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah... maybe some. Not enough tho..."
links.text: "Yeah... maybe some. Not enough though. Would've hoped between that and the de-spooker engaged that we'd be able to align with any frequency, but we're still just medium core, at best."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""... unser einziges Kind. Er kann d..."
links.text: "... unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen..."

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah, maybe it helped *a little*,..."
links.text: "Yeah, maybe it helped *a little*, but the overall picture is still pretty soft core, at best."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Truth be told, you have no idea wha..."
links.text: Truth be told, you have no idea what you're looking for. It just looks like a cord attached to a piece of metal. You pick at the colourful rubber jacketing, not sure what else to do...

links.title: Noid: ""Well? What's it look like?""
links.text: "Well? What's it look like?"

links.title: You: ""The whole statue's covered in weir..."
links.text: "The whole statue's covered in weird oils. I don't think it's good for the connections."

links.title: Noid: ""That's not good. We should've clea..."
links.text: "That's not good. We should've cleaned the centaur-man first. Pretty rude that we didn't..."

links.title: Noid: ""Hang on, I'm looking at Egg's chec..."
links.text: "Hang on, I'm looking at Egg's checklist. He says: 'IF ALL FAILS, BEND ANTENNA. NARROW IS THE HARD CORE WAY'... That make any sense to you?"

links.title: You: ""What are we supposed to use to ben..."
links.text: "What are we supposed to use to bend the antenna?"

links.title: Noid: ""It says here 'MUSCLE-STYLE'.""
links.text: "It says here 'MUSCLE-STYLE'."

links.title: Noid: ""Since you're already up there, I s..."
links.text: "Since you're already up there, I say you should do it."

links.title: Empathy: "The speedfreak is right. The respon..."
links.text: The speedfreak is right. The responsibility is yours and yours alone. There's no turning back now.

links.title: You: "Look at the rider."
links.text: Look at the rider.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "You are face to face with Filippe I..."
links.text: You are face to face with Filippe III. The bronze king looks toward the west. Something about his features seems bizarrely distorted.

links.title: Logic: "Not intentionally. It’s a matter of..."
links.text: Not intentionally. It’s a matter of perspective. The king was never meant to be seen from such an angle as you’ve attained.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "His imperious gaze leads you natura..."
links.text: His imperious gaze leads you naturally to his outstretched hand, which for some reason strikes you as sadly empty...

links.title: Endurance: "He seems ill-equipped for wherever..."
links.text: He seems ill-equipped for wherever he’s going. A king should not go about unarmed.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You can't help but feel that *sabre..."
links.text: You can't help but feel that *sabre* you picked up might just give this old king a little more panache *and* better reception!

links.title: Conceptualization: "Come on! Kings and sabres are so *p..."
links.text: Come on! Kings and sabres are so *played out*. There's a *better* way...

links.title: You: "Wait, what's this 'better way'?"
links.text: Wait, what's this 'better way'?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Why not arm the good king's valiant..."
links.text: Why not arm the good king's valiant steed instead? There seems to be *just* enough room between its teeth there...

links.title: You: "That's brilliant! [Put the sabre be..."
links.text: That's brilliant! [Put the sabre between the horse's teeth.]

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "To your surprise, the sabre slides..."
links.text: To your surprise, the sabre slides snugly between the horse's bared teeth.

links.title: You: "That's a little *too* out there. [P..."
links.text: That's a little *too* out there. [Put the sabre in the king's hand.]

links.title: You: "Keep it to yourself."
links.text: Keep it to yourself.

links.title: You: "Attach the sabre."
links.text: Attach the sabre.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "To your surprise, the sabre's hilt..."
links.text: To your surprise, the sabre's hilt fits quite snugly in the statue's hand. The king cuts quite the triumphal figure now.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There is no way *that* is going to..."
links.text: "There is no way *that* is going to make any difference..."

links.title: Noid: ""Nah, every bit helps. We need this..."
links.text: "Nah, every bit helps. We need this antenna to be as hard core as humanly possible."

links.title: Noid: ""Wow, this is a huge leap forward f..."
links.text: "Wow, this is a huge leap forward for hard core style. Good work."

links.title: You: "Keep it to yourself."
links.text: Keep it to yourself.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "The king won't know what he's missi..."
links.text: The king won't know what he's missing. He looks straight ahead, his expression defiant and verdigris.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Everything in order, detective? Yo..."
links.text: "Everything in order, detective? You're really giving Filippe III a stare."

links.title: Noid: ""You alright up there?""
links.text: "You alright up there?"

links.title: You: "Look at the horse."
links.text: Look at the horse.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "This faithful steed cuts a dashing..."
links.text: This faithful steed cuts a dashing figure with the replica sabre between its teeth.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "This faithful steed is in nearly as..."
links.text: This faithful steed is in nearly as poor a condition as its rider.

links.title: You: "Look up."
links.text: Look up.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "A clear sky. The kind of day where..."
links.text: A clear sky. The kind of day where anything might happen...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "Across the river, you can see Coali..."
links.text: Across the river, you can see Coalition Warship Archer tracing its gradual circuit above Revachol East.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "The sky is gray and overcast. Someh..."
links.text: The sky is gray and overcast. Somehow, the raindrops seem to fall more slowly from this angle...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "Through the scrim, you can just mak..."
links.text: Through the scrim, you can just make out the shadow of Coalition Warship Archer a few kilometres to the east.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "A clear night sky. The stars make f..."
links.text: A clear night sky. The stars make for a brilliant display...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "Across the river, you can see the l..."
links.text: Across the river, you can see the lights of Coalition Warship Archer floating above Revachol East.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "The sky is opaque with dark clouds...."
links.text: The sky is opaque with dark clouds. Somehow, the raindrops seem to fall more slowly from this angle...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "You turn to the east, but the visib..."
links.text: You turn to the east, but the visibility is quite poor. You see no sign of Coalition Warship Archer, though you know it can't be too far away.

links.title: You: "Look down."
links.text: Look down.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "A few of the idle lorry drivers and..."
links.text: A few of the idle lorry drivers and strike breakers gesture at you with their cigarettes, more out of curiosity than anything else. From the window of one of the adjacent apartment buildings, an older woman leans out, her heavy breasts sagging...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "She yells a single word you can't m..."
links.text: She yells a single word you can't make out, and then shuts the window with a violent *thunk*.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Down below a little doll-sized lieu..."
links.text: Down below a little doll-sized lieutenant is looking up, shielding his eyes. He's worried for you.

links.title: You: "Attempt to narrow the receiving mod..."
links.text: Attempt to narrow the receiving mode manually.

links.title: Interfacing: "Your grip is firm, yet controlled...."
links.text: Your grip is firm, yet controlled. The swelling in your headset guides your hands as much as your hands guide the bronze horse head. It's almost like you're hearing *through* the horse itself...

links.title: Noid: ""Looks like it's working. Keep goin..."
links.text: "Looks like it's working. Keep going, just a bit more..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""... Nein, Liebling!""
links.text: "... Nein, Liebling!"

links.title: Interfacing: "The signal is clear, the storm has..."
links.text: The signal is clear, the storm has passed. This is another voice, a live voice, on the other end of this invisible bridge you've established...

links.title: Noid: ""Try it now.""
links.text: "Try it now."

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer. This is..."
links.text: "Coalition Warship Archer. This is RCM Officer Firewalker. Please acknowledge."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "..."
Coalition Warship Archer: ""Firewalker, this is Coalition Wars..."
links.text: "Firewalker, this is Coalition Warship Archer. We are acknowledging and accepting you."

links.title: Noid: ""There it is, the Big Bad. Now be q..."
links.text: "There it is, the Big Bad. Now be quick. I'll keep us aligned as long as I can."

links.title: Authority: "This is it... you're finally gettin..."
links.text: This is it... you're finally getting to speak with those who hold *real* power.

links.title: Rhetoric: "And by that, we mean the ones with..."
links.text: And by that, we mean the ones with the guns and the warships.

links.title: Empathy: "There is so much you wish you could..."
links.text: There is so much you wish you could ask. Your efforts have bought you some time, but you can't forget what you're *really* here for...

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Please be advised that you are spe..."
links.text: "Please be advised that you are speaking on the public frequency. What is your request?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's been a long winter... Long an..."
links.text: "It's been a long winter... Long and cold."

links.title: Noid: ""Bad news, lawman. Signal's going d..."
links.text: "Bad news, lawman. Signal's going down. These waves are receding. Time to let go..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""... Firewalker? Are you there?""
links.text: "... Firewalker? Are you there?"

links.title: Noid: ""This is it: Final question time. I..."
links.text: "This is it: Final question time. I can already feel our alignment getting shaky..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Liebling, bitte... Er ist unser ei..."
links.text: "Liebling, bitte... Er ist unser einziges Kind..."

links.title: Noid: ""Signal's weakening. I'd guess you'..."
links.text: "Signal's weakening. I'd guess you've got about two questions left..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Come again? We are picking up more..."
links.text: "Come again? We are picking up more interference..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's been a long winter... Long an..."
links.text: "It's been a long winter... Long and cold."

links.title: Noid: ""Bad news, lawman. Signal's going d..."
links.text: "Bad news, lawman. Signal's going down. These waves are receding. Time to let go..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""... Firewalker? Are you there?""
links.text: "... Firewalker? Are you there?"

links.title: You: ""Who am I speaking with?""
links.text: "Who am I speaking with?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""You are currently speaking with Co..."
links.text: "You are currently speaking with Coalition Warship Archer, flagship of INSURCOM forces in Revachol."

links.title: You: ""Are you the captain?""
links.text: "Are you the captain?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""No, the captain of the Archer is d..."
links.text: "No, the captain of the Archer is deeply classified intelligence. We are the second signaller."

links.title: You: ""Whoa, the Coalition has *talking*..."
links.text: "Whoa, the Coalition has *talking* warships?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Of course not. It's simply a rheto..."
links.text: "Of course not. It's simply a rhetorical convention, a common synecdoche. We are the second signaller."

links.title: You: ""Sure, but who are *you*? I need to..."
links.text: "Sure, but who are *you*? I need to know your name."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Our name is not important. All you..."
links.text: "Our name is not important. All you need to know is that we hold the position of second signaller aboard the Archer."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Wait-wait, she's an *El-something*,..."
links.text: Wait-wait, she's an *El-something*, you just know it.

links.title: Rhetoric: "There's something in the way she re..."
links.text: There's something in the way she refers to herself, always with the first-person plural. A deliberate blurring of the boundary between herself and the institution she represents...

links.title: Authority: "Not to mention the airborne artille..."
links.text: Not to mention the airborne artillery platform she works on. Her every word is backed up by the most powerful ordnance available...

links.title: You: ""Just one thing, why do you keep re..."
links.text: "Just one thing, why do you keep referring to yourself with the plural?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Because it's standard practice for..."
links.text: "Because it's standard practice for signallers to use the *pluralis officialis* during the course of our duties. It's meant to serve as a reminder that we don't speak only for ourselves."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""For instance, as second signaller..."
links.text: "For instance, as second signaller we represent Coalition Warship Archer, which in turn represents INSURCOM and the Coalition more generally, which in turn represents the Moralist International, which itself represents the interests of 1.2 billion people across the world."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Meaning she's the voice of all thos..."
links.text: Meaning she's the voice of all those living souls!

links.title: You: ""So when I'm talking to you, it's l..."
links.text: "So when I'm talking to you, it's like I'm talking to *all of humanity*?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""No, of course not. There are many..."
links.text: "No, of course not. There are many nations outside the Moralintern's umbrella, in Seol, Samara, and elsewhere. At most you might say the Moralintern represents between a quarter and a third of humanity."

links.title: Composure: "A truth conveyed matter-of-factly,..."
links.text: A truth conveyed matter-of-factly, without pride or self-consciousness.

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Perhaps you could say that we repr..."
links.text: "Perhaps you could say that we represent the interests and hopes of a great many people, but you could say just as easily that we are the assistant to the secretary of a factotum, no more remarkable than the lowest cashier of a common Frittte..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""It all depends on your perspective.""
links.text: "It all depends on your perspective."

links.title: You: ""Who is the secretary?""
links.text: "Who is the secretary?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""The chief signaller, our superior...."
links.text: "The chief signaller, our superior. They are ultimately responsible for all communications aboard the Archer..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""But now we've wandered quite far a..."
links.text: "But now we've wandered quite far afield. What was your request?"

links.title: You: ""Who is the factotum?""
links.text: "Who is the factotum?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Why, the Archer itself...""
links.text: "Why, the Archer itself..."

links.title: You: ""The Moralintern is *nothing* like..."
links.text: "The Moralintern is *nothing* like a Frittte -- you don't even sell the fun stuff!"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""If by 'fun stuff,' you mean alcoho..."
links.text: "If by 'fun stuff,' you mean alcohol and cigarettes, that's true. Actually, we don't even have Fritttes where we're from. In Messina they're called Averros..."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Averro, SRL, is a chain of high-end..."
links.text: Averro, SRL, is a chain of high-end pharmacies found only in Vesper and Messina. They are *much* nicer than your average Frittte.

links.title: You: ""Sounds like kind of a hard job.""
links.text: "Sounds like kind of a hard job."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""It may be a *demanding* job, but t..."
links.text: "It may be a *demanding* job, but the Coalition is committed to ensuring those in its service maintain a healthy work-life balance..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Now... your request?""
links.text: "Now... your request?"

links.title: You: ""That sounds like an awesome respon..."
links.text: "That sounds like an awesome responsibility."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""It's an important responsibility,..."
links.text: "It's an important responsibility, but we don't consider it any greater than those borne by countless people all across the world..."

links.title: You: ""I bet I can guess your name.""
links.text: "I bet I can guess your name."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Really, it's not important. We wou..."
links.text: "Really, it's not important. We would strongly prefer that you state your request."

links.title: You: ""You sound like an Eloïse to me.""
links.text: "You sound like an Eloïse to me."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: "She laughs. "Do we sound like we're..."
links.text: She laughs. "Do we sound like we're from Sur-la-Clef to you?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "That's sarcasm, she's clearly Messi..."
links.text: That's sarcasm, she's clearly Messinian.

links.title: You: ""You're an Elena, aren't you?""
links.text: "You're an Elena, aren't you?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: "A moment of stunned silence. "How d..."
links.text: A moment of stunned silence. "How did you know that?"

links.title: You: ""Just a lucky guess.""
links.text: "Just a lucky guess."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""I... We don't appreciate whatever..."
links.text: "I... We don't appreciate whatever game you're playing, Firewalker. Now, what is your request?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Did you catch that? A crack in her..."
links.text: Did you catch that? A crack in her otherwise solid edifice.

links.title: Suggestion: "Is it possible to *hear* someone bl..."
links.text: Is it possible to *hear* someone blush? Because you're sure that's what she's doing...

links.title: You: ""It was obvious. No other name woul..."
links.text: "It was obvious. No other name would fit you."

links.title: You: ""You're an Eleanora, I'm sure of it.""
links.text: "You're an Eleanora, I'm sure of it."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""We don't believe there is anyone y..."
links.text: "We don't believe there is anyone younger than 70 named Eleanora..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Now, please dispense with the game..."
links.text: "Now, please dispense with the games, Firewalker. This is a public frequency..."

links.title: You: ""You're 100% an Eliška.""
links.text: "You're 100% an Eliška."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""You are 100% wrong...""
links.text: "You are 100% wrong..."

links.title: You: ""What's it like, being a second sig..."
links.text: "What's it like, being a second signaller?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""It's a great honour and responsibi..."
links.text: "It's a great honour and responsibility. In addition to monitoring public frequencies, we are tasked with maintaining some of the most sensitive communications equipment aboard the Archer."

links.title: You: ""How are the benefits?""
links.text: "How are the benefits?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Quite good. We enjoy all the stand..."
links.text: "Quite good. We enjoy all the standard benefits for Moralintern forces on active duty assignments: Excellent healthcare, foreign service pay, a fully funded pension system..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "That sounds *much* better than the..."
links.text: That sounds *much* better than the 5,500 reál the RCM calls a 'salary.'

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""... six-weeks paid leave, bilingua..."
links.text: "... six-weeks paid leave, bilingual childcare, vocational certification credits. Really, it's quite a good career."

links.title: You: ""How's the work-life balance?""
links.text: "How's the work-life balance?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Oh, it's fine...""
links.text: "Oh, it's fine..."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Hold on, you can tell she has more..."
links.text: Hold on, you can tell she has more to say...

links.title: You: ""Me, I'm a workaholic. It's just wh..."
links.text: "Me, I'm a workaholic. It's just what I do..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "A scoff from the lieutenant's chann..."
links.text: A scoff from the lieutenant's channel.

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Then you would like being on an ae..."
links.text: "Then you would like being on an aerostatic, there's always *something* that must be done..."

links.title: You: ""That's good, I wish the RCM gave m..."
links.text: "That's good, I wish the RCM gave me more time off..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Oh, yes, we could always use more..."
links.text: "Oh, yes, we could always use more time off." She laughs politely, but doesn't elaborate.

links.title: You: "(Wait for her to continue.)"
links.text: (Wait for her to continue.)

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""... of course, serving on a Coalit..."
links.text: "... of course, serving on a Coalition warship does require some *personal* sacrifices, but we have to be willing to make them, if we believe in the mission..."

links.title: You: ""What kind of sacrifices?""
links.text: "What kind of sacrifices?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Nothing remarkable. Really, we hav..."
links.text: "Nothing remarkable. Really, we have been very fortunate. But we do sometimes wonder what we might be missing out on, back in Messina..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""But now we have gotten quite far a..."
links.text: "But now we have gotten quite far afield. What was your request?"

links.title: You: ""As long as you believe in the miss..."
links.text: "As long as you believe in the mission, it's all worth it."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Yes, of course. There is no higher..."
links.text: "Yes, of course. There is no higher calling than serving humanity."

links.title: You: ""Do you believe in the mission?""
links.text: "Do you believe in the mission?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Yes, of course. There is no higher..."
links.text: "Yes, of course. There is no higher calling than serving humanity."

links.title: Inland Empire: "You really don't have the faintest..."
links.text: You really don't have the faintest guess what her name could be. You were never very good at this sort of thing...

links.title: You: ""What does Revachol look like from..."
links.text: "What does Revachol look like from up there?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Hmmm, that's difficult to say. We..."
links.text: "Hmmm, that's difficult to say. We have a very particular view from our observation platform up here."

links.title: You: ""Particular how?""
links.text: "Particular how?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Perhaps the best way to describe i..."
links.text: "Perhaps the best way to describe it is to say we have a *very wide perspective*, but not an especially detailed one."

links.title: You: ""What can you see?""
links.text: "What can you see?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Well, it's rather dark now, but fr..."
links.text: "Well, it's rather dark now, but from our porthole, we can just make out the rolling hillsides. We can see the lanterns lining the walkways through a public park..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""There are a few people on horses b..."
links.text: "There are a few people on horses by a small pond. The homes and gardens are quite beautiful, very near like those in certain areas of Messina."

links.title: Shivers: "Le Jardin, Stella Maris, Saint-Bati..."
links.text: Le Jardin, Stella Maris, Saint-Batiste. She is looking down on the suburbs of Revachol East.

links.title: You: ""You're above Revachol East then.""
links.text: "You're above Revachol East then."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Ah, that must be. We have only rec..."
links.text: "Ah, that must be. We have only recently been detailed to the Archer, so we are still learning the names of all the many districts..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "She needs to see *you*, down here...."
links.text: She needs to see *you*, down here. That's the only way she'll really *get* what you're about.

links.title: You: ""Can you see Martinaise from where..."
links.text: "Can you see Martinaise from where you are?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Martinaise, Martinaise... That is..."
links.text: "Martinaise, Martinaise... That is to the west, yes?"

links.title: You: ""Yes. Look across the River Esperan..."
links.text: "Yes. Look across the River Esperance."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Stand by a moment... we are adjust..."
links.text: "Stand by a moment... we are adjusting our viewfinder..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Yes, we are looking at the river n..."
links.text: "Yes, we are looking at the river now. There are small islands in the middle of it. It's very nice, actually..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Interesting. The west of the city..."
links.text: "Interesting. The west of the city looks *very* different from the east. There's a large motorway dividing it nearly in half. This must be the 8/81, no?"

links.title: You: ""Exactly. Follow that west for a fe..."
links.text: "Exactly. Follow that west for a few kilometres, until you see the lake."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Very well. Now we are looking at a..."
links.text: "Very well. Now we are looking at an area that seems to be in urgent need of *revitalisation*..."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "She must be describing the Eminent..."
links.text: She must be describing the Eminent Domain, the district under the shadow of the 8/81. It's heavily *working class*, with no municipal infrastructure to speak of. To your knowledge, no such revitalisation is forthcoming.

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Now we see the lake, and around th..."
links.text: "Now we see the lake, and around that a rather vibrant-looking city quarter. There are some large buildings, from the turn-of-the-century, we would guess. Yes, this must be the heart of the district."
links.title: You: ""That's Jamrock. Now look to the no..."
links.text: "That's Jamrock. Now look to the north, toward the harbour."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Mhmmm... ah. So *that* is Martinai..."
links.text: "Mhmmm... ah. So *that* is Martinaise..."
links.title: Composure: "A distended pause. A slight chill o..."
links.text: A distended pause. A slight chill of embarrassment. She isn't sure what to say.
links.title: You: ""That bad, huh?""
links.text: "That bad, huh?"
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""It is quite striking, compared to..."
links.text: "It is quite striking, compared to where we're from. There are a great many destroyed buildings, *still*. And we don't see any horses... It's really *nothing* like the eastern side of the city..."
links.title: Savoir Faire: "You're reminded of something people..."
links.text: You're reminded of something people used to say, that Revachol West is poor, but *sexy poor*.
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""But what's most striking are the p..."
links.text: "But what's most striking are the people. They just... we don't even know how to say it..."
links.title: You: ""Look like a bunch of tiny apes duk..."
links.text: "Look like a bunch of tiny apes dukin' it out on a great big ball?"
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Perhaps? We do not generally reach..."
links.text: "Perhaps? We do not generally reach for such *evocative imagery*, but there is something rather desperate about them."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""And then there's all the *tare* ly..."
links.text: "And then there's all the *tare* lying about. It's very unpleasant to look at. We're going to widen our viewfinder a bit."
links.title: You: ""There's a tare machine in the Frit..."
links.text: "There's a tare machine in the Frittte. It's one way to scrape by around here."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Ah! What a difference a few well-d..."
links.text: "Ah! What a difference a few well-designed market incentives can make. And, of course, it is important for the RCM to set an example."
links.title: You: ""I guess they should install some r..."
links.text: "I guess they should install some recycling bins or something."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Yes, recycling is very important...."
links.text: "Yes, recycling is very important. The Coalition always supports initiatives that promote civic responsibility and mindfulness."
links.title: You: ""Do you see a roundabout, with an e..."
links.text: "Do you see a roundabout, with an equestrian statue?" (Proceed.)
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""A roundabout, a roundabout...""
links.text: "A roundabout, a roundabout..."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Strange... we see the roundabout,..."
links.text: "Strange... we see the roundabout, and the monument, but... the horse seems to be *missing* its head... and there's a man *on top of it*?"
links.title: You: ""That's me!" (Wave your hand.)"
links.text: "That's me!" (Wave your hand.)
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""That's *you*? We have to say, that..."
links.text: "That's *you*? We have to say, that's extremely irregular, Firewalker. What are you doing on top of that public monument?"
links.title: You: ""Listen, Archer -- Martinaise is a..."
links.text: "Listen, Archer -- Martinaise is a *disco* town."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""How interesting. In Messina, disco..."
links.text: "How interesting. In Messina, disco has been extinct for more than a decade. Funny how the past always seems more present in some parts of the world."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""In any event, it is certainly inte..."
links.text: "In any event, it is certainly interesting to see you, even from afar. Most of the time, we signallers just have to *imagine* what our interlocutors look like."
links.title: You: ""I guess you could say it's sort of..."
links.text: "I guess you could say it's sort of a *performance piece*."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Interesting. We don't know much ab..."
links.text: "Interesting. We don't know much about Revacholian art, so you'll have to forgive our ignorance."
links.title: You: ""I'm singing the song of annihilati..."
links.text: "I'm singing the song of annihilation."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""That must be a Martinaise custom...."
links.text: "That must be a Martinaise custom. You'll have to forgive our ignorance. We are still relatively new here."
links.title: You: ""It's... kind of an involved story.""
links.text: "It's... kind of an involved story."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""It must be. Unfortunately we do no..."
links.text: "It must be. Unfortunately we do not have time to hear it just now."
links.title: You: ""Oh right, people climb on monument..."
links.text: "Oh right, people climb on monuments all the time here. It's kind of a local tradition."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""How curious. You learn the most in..."
links.text: "How curious. You learn the most interesting things on these sorts of assignments."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""In any event, thank you for this *..."
links.text: "In any event, thank you for this *tour* of Revachol West. It has certainly been... educational."
links.title: You: ""Would you say he seems like a *han..."
links.text: "Would you say he seems like a *handsome* man?"
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""To be completely honest, Firewalke..."
links.text: "To be completely honest, Firewalker, we are not in a position to say. We can't really make out *faces* from this distance..."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""From here all we can really see ar..."
links.text: "From here all we can really see are his enormous muttonchops. Perhaps he is some sort of motorcyclist?"
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""In any event, thank you for this *..."
links.text: "In any event, thank you for this *tour* of Revachol West. It has certainly been... educational."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""From here all we can really see ar..."
links.text: "From here all we can really see are his pale cheeks. He looks like he hasn't slept in days."
links.title: You: ""Look like a bunch of lost souls, w..."
links.text: "Look like a bunch of lost souls, wandering about in *indescribable* pain?"
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""We really couldn't say. That's one..."
links.text: "We really couldn't say. That's one of the limits of this vantage. But the whole district does have a very *desperate* character."
links.title: You: ""Look happy and well adjusted?""
links.text: "Look happy and well adjusted?"
links.title: You: ""Look like ants, isn't that what th..."
links.text: "Look like ants, isn't that what they say?"
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""There are people who say that, but..."
links.text: "There are people who say that, but we've never felt that way. To us they look like miniature figures, the kind you see in model train sets. But this... this is a *very sad* train set."
links.title: You: ""Pretty different from Adversperasc..."
links.text: "Pretty different from Adversperascit, isn't it?"
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""*Extremely different*. We knew the..."
links.text: "*Extremely different*. We knew there were still parts of Revachol that have not fully recovered from the Revolution, but here the destruction is quite evident, even compared to the eastern side of the city..."
links.title: You: ""What do you see?""
links.text: "What do you see?"
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Ah, well, we see the many, hmmm, *..."
links.text: "Ah, well, we see the many, hmmm, *historic* buildings, of course, and the snow gathering along the rim of the bay..."
links.title: Shivers: "... the old and irregular streets,..."
links.text: ... the old and irregular streets, like a grid drawn by a palsied hand. The open fires burning in oil drums, visible through blasted roofs...
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""There are also a number of seabird..."
links.text: "There are also a number of seabirds looping and twisting in the wind below us. No horses, though... And of course we can see some people, but they, oh, how to say it..."

links.title: You: ""Maybe follow the motorway as far a..."
links.text: "Maybe follow the motorway as far as it goes?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""It appears to go on for quite a wh..."
links.text: "It appears to go on for quite a while. There's a heavily industrialised district that seems to abut Monte-Martin..."

links.title: You: ""A *motorway*? I have no idea what..."
links.text: "A *motorway*? I have no idea what you're talking about."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Really? It seems quite important...."
links.text: "Really? It seems quite important. It may be the largest road in the city..."

links.title: You: ""Uh, sure. Let's go with west.""
links.text: "Uh, sure. Let's go with west."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Hold on. We're adjusting our viewf..."
links.text: "Hold on. We're adjusting our viewfinder..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Ah, we are looking at a great rive..."
links.text: "Ah, we are looking at a great river now. This must be the Esperance. It's very nice, actually..."

links.title: You: ""I thought it was to the south?""
links.text: "I thought it was to the south?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""To the south. Let us see...""
links.text: "To the south. Let us see..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""No, that cannot be right. That way..."
links.text: "No, that cannot be right. That way is only sprawl. We were under the impression that Martinaise was nearer to the Bay..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""But now we seem to be quite turned..."
links.text: "But now we seem to be quite turned about. We'll have to consult a map in the future. Now, was there something else?"

links.title: You: ""Nope, it's to the north. Definitel..."
links.text: "Nope, it's to the north. Definitely north."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""But to the north is all water...""
links.text: "But to the north is all water..."

links.title: You: ""That's right. Martinaise is a high..."
links.text: "That's right. Martinaise is a highly experimental *sub-aquatic* district."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Ah, we see. You are playing a prac..."
links.text: "Ah, we see. You are playing a practical joke. Very funny..."

links.title: Logic: "If it's so funny, why isn't she lau..."
links.text: If it's so funny, why isn't she laughing?

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Enough jokes, then. What was your..."
links.text: "Enough jokes, then. What was your request?"

links.title: You: ""You're right. I just got turned ar..."
links.text: "You're right. I just got turned around. It's probably to the south."

links.title: You: ""Hmmm. Maybe it *is* to the west, t..."
links.text: "Hmmm. Maybe it *is* to the west, then?"

links.title: You: ""Where are you, exactly?""
links.text: "Where are you, exactly?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""We cannot say for certain. East, i..."
links.text: "We cannot say for certain. East, it must be? We have only recently been detailed to the Archer, so we are still learning the names of all the many districts..."

links.title: You: "(Look around.) "Huh, I don't see *a..."
links.text: (Look around.) "Huh, I don't see *any* of that stuff."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Perhaps you are in a different par..."
links.text: "Perhaps you are in a different part of the city? We have only recently been detailed to the Archer, so we are still learning the names of all the many districts..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Oh, it looks quite lovely from her..."
links.text: "Oh, it looks quite lovely from here. From our porthole, we see rolling hillsides covered with snow, a public park filled with grand oak trees, men and women going about on horses..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Ah, there are children building a..."
links.text: "Ah, there are children building a snowman by a small pond. The homes and gardens are quite beautiful, very near like those in certain areas of Messina."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Oh, it looks quite lovely from her..."
links.text: "Oh, it looks quite lovely from here, even with the rain. From our porthole, we see rolling hillsides, a public park filled with grand oak trees, men and women going about on horses..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Ah, there are children running hom..."
links.text: "Ah, there are children running home to get out of the rain. The homes and gardens are quite beautiful, very near like those in certain areas of Messina."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Oh, it looks quite lovely from her..."
links.text: "Oh, it looks quite lovely from here. From our porthole, we see rolling hillsides, a public park filled with grand oak trees, men and women going about on horses..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Ah, there are children playing by..."
links.text: "Ah, there are children playing by a small pond. The homes and gardens are quite beautiful, very near like those in certain areas of Messina."

links.title: You: ""What does the Moralintern *really*..."
links.text: "What does the Moralintern *really* want?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""A very important question with a v..."
links.text: "A very important question with a very simple answer: We want humanity to endure."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Beyond that, it may be said that w..."
links.text: "Beyond that, it may be said that we are the inheritors and stewards of Dolores Dei's legacy."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Dolores Dei... so, *so* beautiful."
links.text: Dolores Dei... so, *so* beautiful.

links.title: You: ""Dolores Dei... she was really beau..."
links.text: "Dolores Dei... she was really beautiful, right?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Oh, *incomparably* so, but that is..."
links.text: "Oh, *incomparably* so, but that isn't what made her so remarkable."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Not true. Her beauty was like the g..."
links.text: Not true. Her beauty was like the glowing coil on a hot stove, and yet you felt *blessed* to touch it...

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""She was the greatest innocence, th..."
links.text: "She was the greatest innocence, the single most consequential being to have ever lived. Her legacy touches every aspect of modern life."

links.title: You: ""Wait, people keep mentioning this..."
links.text: "Wait, people keep mentioning this Dolores Dei, but I have *no* clue who she is..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""She was the greatest innocence, th..."
links.text: "She was the greatest innocence, the single most consequential being to have ever lived. Her legacy touches every aspect of modern life."

links.title: Empathy: "Very odd that you've never heard of..."
links.text: Very odd that you've never heard of this person, perhaps even stranger that she seems unfazed by your ignorance.

links.title: You: ""Right, and that legacy is...?""
links.text: "Right, and that legacy is...?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Immeasurable. It includes interiso..."
links.text: "Immeasurable. It includes interisolary travel, three scientific revolutions, humanism, internationalism, the welfare state, and *balance of terror theory*. Nothing less than the intellectual foundation of our modern order."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""The role of the Moralist Internati..."
links.text: "The role of the Moralist International is two-fold, to buy humanity sufficient time to perfect itself, and to patiently guide it along the road while protecting it from ideological highwaymen and eschatologians."

links.title: You: ""What is this 'balance of terror th..."
links.text: "What is this 'balance of terror theory'?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""It's an elegant idea, one of the c..."
links.text: "It's an elegant idea, one of the cornerstones of the modern era. In short, it holds that durable, lasting peace is possible when the major powers are capable of inflicting unacceptable and irreversible destruction upon one another..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Because no rational state is willi..."
links.text: "Because no rational state is willing to accept the risk of such a calamity befalling its own people, all powers are incentivised to *de-escalate* conflicts before they reach the point of no return."

links.title: You: ""And has it worked?""
links.text: "And has it worked?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""For the most part, it has. The wor..."
links.text: "For the most part, it has. The world is certainly not free of violent conflict, but in the modern era we have made great strides to reduce its frequency, duration, and severity."

links.title: You: ""But what if states *aren't* ration..."
links.text: "But what if states *aren't* rational?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""A state is like any other living t..."
links.text: "A state is like any other living thing -- it wants to survive and grow. A state that doesn't value its own existence is not a state at all."

links.title: You: ""In what sense is the Moralintern t..."
links.text: "In what sense is the Moralintern the steward of Dolores Dei's legacy?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""It was established by many of the..."
links.text: "It was established by many of the same Founding Party members who elected Dolores Dei, and who, after her assassination, dedicated their lives to the continuation of her political and intellectual project."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The *other* members of the Founding..."
links.text: The *other* members of the Founding Party moved to Sur-la-Clef and invented modern corporate finance. Their names may still be found on the pediments of some of the largest investment banks in the world.

links.title: You: ""Who are the highwaymen and eschato..."
links.text: "Who are the highwaymen and eschatologians you mentioned?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""There are many. The communists say..."
links.text: "There are many. The communists say they are the next dialectical step in an inexorable spiral of progress. They claim to have resolved the 'inherent contradictions' of moralism and believe they're just one revolution away from establishing a humanist paradise..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""The fascists say they are *both* t..."
links.text: "The fascists say they are *both* the ancestors of and the successors to Dolorianism. In other words, they believe that Dolores Dei's reign simply represents a glorious phase of expansion within a greater Franconigerian heritage. They criticise the Dolorian project for accepting and integrating new peoples rather than forcefully subjugating them..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""And then there are our prodigal co..."
links.text: "And then there are our prodigal cousins, the Vaasan social democrats, who hold our same values and have even adopted many of our same rites and iconography, though they persist in rejecting the umbrella of moralism."

links.title: Rhetoric: "For some reason it's the social dem..."
links.text: For some reason it's the social democrats she sounds most exasperated with.

links.title: You: ""Sometimes I wonder if the communis..."
links.text: "Sometimes I wonder if the communists may have a point, at least intellectually speaking."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Many political theorists have argu..."
links.text: "Many political theorists have argued that communism accepts the logic of Dolorian humanism while abandoning its spirit. They offer a cautionary tale, in other words, about attempting to found a paradise atop bones and ashes..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Whose bones and whose ashes, exactl..."
links.text: Whose bones and whose ashes, exactly? You don't think the Coalition pacified Revachol with *bonbons*, do you?

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""But it's a delicate and very compl..."
links.text: "But it's a delicate and very complicated subject. And of course every belief system has something to recommend it."

links.title: You: ""What the fascists say makes a cert..."
links.text: "What the fascists say makes a certain *gut-level* sense."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""And therein lies their danger. The..."
links.text: "And therein lies their danger. They 'feel' true without *being* true..."

links.title: Endurance: "You know your people's history. You..."
links.text: You know your people's history. You don't need some *foreign wöman* in a fancy airship to tell you what's what.

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""If you believe so strongly in your..."
links.text: "If you believe so strongly in your own destiny that the rest of reality exists only as a warped reflection of it, how can it be contradicted?"

links.title: You: ""Why do you resent social democrats..."
links.text: "Why do you resent social democrats more than communists and fascists?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""We don't resent them. It's more th..."
links.text: "We don't resent them. It's more that we are... *disappointed* that they have chosen to emphasise certain points of dispute over broad areas of accord..."

links.title: Empathy: "She speaks of them like a family me..."
links.text: She speaks of them like a family member she's abandoned hope of ever maturing.

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""But of course, they also remain de..."
links.text: "But of course, they also remain dependable partners in a number of centrist governing coalitions."

links.title: You: ""Are there *non-ideological* threat..."
links.text: "Are there *non-ideological* threats to humanity's future?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Yes. Atomic war, environmental deg..."
links.text: "Yes. Atomic war, environmental degradation, resource exhaustion, viral pandemic, super-volcanism, runaway entroponetic collapse..."

links.title: Logic: "If the opportunity presents itself,..."
links.text: If the opportunity presents itself, perhaps you should mention the two-millimetre hole you recently discovered.

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""This is why it is critical for the..."
links.text: "This is why it is critical for the international community to work toward peace and cooperation between nations. There's simply too much at stake."

links.title: You: ""Where does the RCM fit into all of..."
links.text: "Where does the RCM fit into all of this?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""The RCM exists under the umbrella..."
links.text: "The RCM exists under the umbrella of the Coalition, just as the Coalition exists under the umbrella of the Moralintern..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""At the same time, the RCM is not e..."
links.text: "At the same time, the RCM is not exactly *of* the Coalition."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean it's not *of* the..."
links.text: "What do you mean it's not *of* the Coalition?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""It's our understanding that the RC..."
links.text: "It's our understanding that the RCM's organisational structure predates the Coalition. We believe it may even be modelled after the communard brigades themselves."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There is some truth to that," the..."
links.text: "There is some truth to that," the lieutenant whispers into his headset.

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""But in a practical sense, it's the..."
links.text: "But in a practical sense, it's the responsibility of the Ethics Division to ensure that both organisations are working toward the same ends."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Ethics Division is the branch o..."
links.text: The Ethics Division is the branch of the RCM that coordinates activities with the Coalition. It's composed of high-ranking RCM officials and their medium-ranking Moralintern counterparts. It's considered a career-making assignment for elite RCM officers.

links.title: Empathy: "In other words, it's a fundamental..."
links.text: In other words, it's a fundamental part of the RCM, so you probably shouldn't ask her any questions about it.

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "Hey, Kim. Why haven't y..."
links.text: (Whisper.) "Hey, Kim. Why haven't you joined the Ethics Division?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suppose I enjoy casework too muc..."
links.text: "I suppose I enjoy casework too much. But surely you have more interesting things to discuss with the Coalition than my career path."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Firewalker, was there anything els..."
links.text: "Firewalker, was there anything else?"

links.title: You: ""So you're saying the RCM is a vest..."
links.text: "So you're saying the RCM is a vestige of Revachol's communist past?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""One now committed to upholding mor..."
links.text: "One now committed to upholding moralist values. Strange, isn't it?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""History is a river coursing ever d..."
links.text: "History is a river coursing ever downward. Occasionally its course is redirected in mysterious and unexpected ways."

links.title: You: ""Why bother with the RCM at all? Ca..."
links.text: "Why bother with the RCM at all? Can't the Coalition just run everything itself?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Because the Coalition has no inter..."
links.text: "Because the Coalition has no interest in *running* Revachol. We'll succeed in our mission the moment Revachol rejoins the international community as a sovereign democracy. The RCM is an integral piece of that project."

links.title: You: ""You mean because of the décomptage?""
links.text: "You mean because of the décomptage?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""We're not that familiar with RCM l..."
links.text: "We're not that familiar with RCM lore and practice, but we believe that may be the case. As we recall, the décomptage originated with the Revacholian Commune itself."

links.title: You: ""That's confusing.""
links.text: "That's confusing."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Of course. This is history we're t..."
links.text: "Of course. This is history we're talking about."

links.title: Rhetoric: "She's got you there..."
links.text: She's got you there...

links.title: You: ""What awaits us at the end of the r..."
links.text: "What awaits us at the end of the road?" (Proceed.)

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Let us answer your question with a..."
links.text: "Let us answer your question with a question: Have you ever seen evening fall over the old town of Advesperascit?"

links.title: You: ""Maybe? I've been forgetting things..."
links.text: "Maybe? I've been forgetting things lately."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""If you had, then you would remembe..."
links.text: "If you had, then you would remember. It is one of the great wonders of the world, impossible to mistake or forget."

links.title: You: ""No, I haven't.""
links.text: "No, I haven't."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""The heart of the city, the old tow..."
links.text: "The heart of the city, the old town, is a district composed of weathered marble, comprising thousands of columns and arcades arranged around a series of grand plazas. During the day it's a beautiful sight, equal to any of the great cities of Perikarnassis."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""But as the sun sets, the shadows c..."
links.text: "But as the sun sets, the shadows cast by those columns and arcades weave together to form an intricate umbral lattice. When you see it, you suddenly understand: It was all built for you, for *this very moment*."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The name Advesperascit means 'Eveni..."
links.text: The name Advesperascit means 'Evening Comes.'

links.title: You: ""Built for *me*?""
links.text: "Built for *me*?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""For you, for all of humanity...""
links.text: "For you, for all of humanity..."

links.title: You: ""Built by whom?""
links.text: "Built by whom?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""By thousands of people over many c..."
links.text: "By thousands of people over many centuries, in keeping with a precise plan each believed in but never expected to see the final completion of..."

links.title: You: "(Say nothing.)"
links.text: (Say nothing.)

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Not only that, but you, you are al..."
links.text: "Not only that, but you, you are also part of that centuries-long plan. When you cross one of the open plazas, your own shadow is effortlessly woven into the great latticework, a deliberate synthesis of humanity, art, and the natural world."

links.title: You: ""Beautiful.""
links.text: "Beautiful."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Yes, it is. We grew up there. We h..."
links.text: "Yes, it is. We grew up there. We have seen the lattice with our own eyes."

links.title: You: ""Advesperascit... Dolores Dei was c..."
links.text: "Advesperascit... Dolores Dei was crowned there, wasn't she?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""She was. There are even those who..."
links.text: "She was. There are even those who say that Advesperascit *summoned* Dolores Dei, or that it was built in preparation for her, centuries before her arrival..."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""That's why the old town is sometim..."
links.text: "That's why the old town is sometimes called 'The Ceremonial Heart of Humanity'..."

links.title: You: ""Where is Advesperascit exactly?""
links.text: "Where is Advesperascit exactly?"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""In Messina, of course. Not only wa..."
links.text: "In Messina, of course. Not only was it the site of Dolores Dei's crowning, it was also one of the great cities of the Dolorian era, a glorious expression of humanity's highest potential..."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Of course, such a city does not sp..."
links.text: "Of course, such a city does not spring from nowhere, nor does it endure without effort. Its construction was the work of many generations, and its preservation is an equally monumental responsibility."
links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "There's a word on the tip of your t..."
links.text: There's a word on the tip of your tongue, a name: 'Egret.' Don't ask us what it means, we're not sure.
links.title: Encyclopedia: "It's the name of a common bird, a h..."
links.text: It's the name of a common bird, a heron with white plumage. At various times its feathers have been prised for ladies' hats.
links.title: You: ""This might sound strange, but does..."
links.text: "This might sound strange, but does the word 'egret' mean anything to you?"
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Yes, it does..." She sounds taken..."
links.text: "Yes, it does..." She sounds taken aback. "It's the name of a bird, of course, but it's also the designation for the Archer's coordinated impact artillery system. Why do you ask?"
links.title: You: ""I was just thinking about birds.""
links.text: "I was just thinking about birds."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Ah, yes. The birdwatching here is..."
links.text: "Ah, yes. The birdwatching here is very lovely. We saw a pair of great skuas on the wing earlier today."
links.title: You: ""I was just thinking about artiller..."
links.text: "I was just thinking about artillery systems."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""It is one of the most advanced cur..."
links.text: "It is one of the most advanced currently in service. Capable of firing fifty rounds per minute along twenty co-aligned arcs..."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""However you feel about weaponry as..."
links.text: "However you feel about weaponry as such, it is one of the great technical achievements of the modern era."
links.title: You: ""No reason, the name just came to m..."
links.text: "No reason, the name just came to mind."
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Yes, names tend to do that, don't..."
links.text: "Yes, names tend to do that, don't they?"
links.title: You: ""How much time does humanity need t..."
links.text: "How much time does humanity need to achieve its potential?"
links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""About 3,000 years.""
links.text: "About 3,000 years."
