links.text: "Yes, I imagine it must be."
links.title: Composure: "... but that's no excuse to unload..."
links.text: ... but that's no excuse to unload on a bystander, he allows to remain unsaid...
links.title: You: ""Probably I just misspoke. I meant..."
links.text: "Probably I just misspoke. I meant to say something else."
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really? I don't think this is the..."
links.text: "Really? I don't think this is the *first* time you've *misspoken* in that way."
links.title: Rhetoric: "He means that it's becoming an unfo..."
links.text: He means that it's becoming an unfortunate *fixture* in your vocabulary...
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suppose that's possible...""
links.text: "I suppose that's possible..."
links.title: Logic: "... but not likely, he does not fee..."
links.text: ... but not likely, he does not feel compelled to add.
links.title: You: ""Nope, not a clue.""
links.text: "Nope, not a clue."
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmmm. Well, in that case...""
links.text: "Hmmm. Well, in that case..."
links.title: You: ""Women, am I right?""
links.text: "Women, am I right?"
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, you ridiculous fool. You're *n..."
links.text: "No, you ridiculous fool. You're *not* right. You're not even remotely right."
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's as though *right* is over her..."
links.text: "It's as though *right* is over here..." He holds up one hand. "... while *you're* over here..." He holds up his other hand, as far apart from the first as possible.
links.title: Volition: "The last time you saw the lieutenan..."
links.text: The last time you saw the lieutenant this upset was after that *thing you said in the church*...
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In fact, if right were a country,..."
links.text: "In fact, if right were a country, you would be deported immediately. You would be *persona non grata* in the Country of Right."
links.title: You: ""Okay, Kim, I got it.""
links.text: "Okay, Kim, I got it."
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really? Because I'm not entirely s..."
links.text: "Really? Because I'm not entirely sure that you *do*, detective."
links.title: You: "Let him keep going."
links.text: Let him keep going.
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What I'm trying to say, is that in..."
links.text: "What I'm trying to say, is that in your own twisted way, you're *almost a genius*, a genius who's dedicated his entire malignant existence to devising new and spectacular ways to be *wrong*."
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant takes a deep breath,..."
links.text: The lieutenant takes a deep breath, appearing to gather even more energy and rage, but when he opens his mouth to continue his fulmination, he just sighs...
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I apologise, detective. I let my e..."
links.text: "I apologise, detective. I let my emotions get the better of me just now. You can be a fine police officer, but sometimes you, well..."
links.title: Esprit de Corps: "There's nothing to add, he thinks...."
links.text: There's nothing to add, he thinks. The situation speaks for itself.
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sorry, detective. That wasn't enti..."
links.text: "Sorry, detective. That wasn't entirely justified. You're not *all* bad. It's just that sometimes, you, well..."
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you know what the worst part is..."
links.text: "Do you know what the worst part is, detective? The more time I spend with you, the more I feel myself *becoming* like you..."
links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Are there more terrible words to he..."
links.text: Are there more terrible words to hear from your half-brother?
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, get down from there. We've go..."
links.text: "Now, get down from there. We've got work to do."
links.title: Volition: "Uh oh, you've never seen the lieute..."
links.text: Uh oh, you've never seen the lieutenant this wound up before...
links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""No, no, no -- please don't go...""
links.text: "No, no, no -- please don't go..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Two... one... 'Après le monde, le..."
links.text: "Two... one... 'Après le monde, le gris'..."

links.title: You: ""'Après le gris, le monde encore'...""
links.text: "'Après le gris, le monde encore'..."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: "Disconnect before she clears the li..."
links.text: Disconnect before she clears the line.

links.title: You: ""Totally. I would've solved this th..."
links.text: "Totally. I would've solved this thing *days* ago if it weren't for the ass-riding."

links.title: You: ""Just... all day, every day... I tu..."
links.text: "Just... all day, every day... I turn my head and there he is, on my ass, riding like there's no tomorrow."

links.title: You: ""I am the Foreteller of Ruin, and I..."
links.text: "I am the Foreteller of Ruin, and I’ve come to tell you that the end is very, very nigh."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""We're not sure we understand. To w..."
links.text: "We're not sure we understand. To what 'end' are you referring?"

links.title: You: ""The final seal has been broken, an..."
links.text: "The final seal has been broken, and the blood-dimmed tide is rising."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Enough with the apocalyptic drivel..."
links.text: "Enough with the apocalyptic drivel! Archer, please disregard, he's not in his right mind."

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""They can't hear us, I'm afraid. On..."
links.text: "They can't hear us, I'm afraid. Only his microphone is connected to the transceiver."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't understand. I thought he w..."
links.text: "I don't understand. I thought he was making progress..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This absolute lunatic! But why am..."
links.text: "This absolute lunatic! But why am I surprised?"

links.title: Noid: ""No use. The Big Bad can't hear us,..."
links.text: "No use. The Big Bad can't hear us, just the main cop."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Firewalker, surely you are aware t..."
links.text: "Firewalker, surely you are aware that it is a civil offence to maliciously or frivolously obstruct a Coalition radio frequency..."

links.title: You: ""I'm saying you and me and everyone..."
links.text: "I'm saying you and me and everyone we know is going to die, probably very soon."

links.title: You: ""Technically, according to some cul..."
links.text: "Technically, according to some cultures, it's less of an 'end' and more like a change in states of matter."

links.title: You: ""The thing is, I can't remember *an..."
links.text: "The thing is, I can't remember *anything*."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""So you're experiencing acute memor..."
links.text: "So you're experiencing acute memory loss. We don't see how this is the Committee's business."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good god, here we go...""
links.text: "Good god, here we go..."

links.title: You: ""I’m pretty sure it has to do with..."
links.text: "I’m pretty sure it has to do with the prodigious quantities of drugs and alcohol I consumed."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""We're afraid we don't understand...."
links.text: "We're afraid we don't understand. Are you requesting medical attention?"

links.title: You: ""Yes, I think I might be.""
links.text: "Yes, I think I might be."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Then we recommend you speak with y..."
links.text: "Then we recommend you speak with your station lazareth. This has nothing to do with the Committee of Responsibility..."

links.title: You: ""No, we're *way* past that.""
links.text: "No, we're *way* past that."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Then we are not sure what assistan..."
links.text: "Then we are not sure what assistance can be rendered. This is quite beyond the purview of the Committee of Responsibility..."

links.title: You: ""I already talked to my station laz..."
links.text: "I already talked to my station lazareth and he wasn't helpful *at all*."

links.title: You: ""I’m pretty sure it all goes back t..."
links.text: "I’m pretty sure it all goes back to an *ex-something*."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""We're afraid we don't understand a..."
links.text: "We're afraid we don't understand at all. What does this 'something' have to do with your lost memory?"

links.title: You: ""If I knew that, I wouldn't *be* in..."
links.text: "If I knew that, I wouldn't *be* in this situation!"

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""We are sorry to hear of your loss,..."
links.text: "We are sorry to hear of your loss, but personal tragedy is quite beyond the purview of the Committee of Responsibility..."

links.title: You: ""I'd really prefer to speak with th..."
links.text: "I'd really prefer to speak with the Committee directly."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Unfortunately we cannot accept you..."
links.text: "Unfortunately we cannot accept your request. We really have no idea what you are talking about, but we're quite sure it is beyond the purview of the Committee of Responsibility..."

links.title: You: ""Hang on, Archer, I meant to ask yo..."
links.text: "Hang on, Archer, I meant to ask you about the Committee of Responsibility."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Firewalker... please repeat... you..."
links.text: "Firewalker... please repeat... your signal is *very* weak..."

links.title: You: ""I said there's no time. And now yo..."
links.text: "I said there's no time. And now you're going to leave too..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zu..."
links.text: "Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""... nothing important, bad connect..."
links.text: "... nothing important, bad connection... Going to update the receiving frequency..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "... and the line goes quiet."
links.text: ... and the line goes quiet.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "There, you really showed her."
links.text: There, you really showed her.

links.title: Logic: "Showed her *what*, though?"
links.text: Showed her *what*, though?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gives a long sigh as..."
links.text: The lieutenant gives a long sigh as he removes his headphones. There's relief on his face as he turns toward you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think it's best for you to climb..."
links.text: "I think it's best for you to climb off the statue now, detective. Your real work is down here."

links.title: You: ""Just give me a minute.""
links.text: "Just give me a minute."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "There's a damp cold running up the..."
links.text: There's a damp cold running up the insides of your thighs. Your legs have grown stiff. You've been up here quite a while.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "You look around. The strike breaker..."
links.text: You look around. The strike breakers are still shouting their slogans and waving their hand-painted signs. Beneath you, the programmer has begun disconnecting a few cables...

links.title: Volition: "You could stay a while longer, if y..."
links.text: You could stay a while longer, if you wanted.

links.title: You: "Wait a little longer."
links.text: Wait a little longer.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "Out on the bay, a pair of dinghies..."
links.text: Out on the bay, a pair of dinghies bob and roll in the waves. The breeze drags the voices of the fisherman toward the plaza, faint and indecipherable.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "Further out, a few dirty icebergs d..."
links.text: Further out, a few dirty icebergs drift to and fro. Further still, at the outer edge of your recognizance, the ancient ruins of the seafort lay piled on the horison...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Everything alright, detective?""
links.text: "Everything alright, detective?"

links.title: You: ""I'm fine.""
links.text: "I'm fine."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Listen, I understand that you're d..."
links.text: "Listen, I understand that you're disappointed that things did not turn out how you might have hoped..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But that's just how things go. We..."
links.text: "But that's just how things go. We all must accept our own shortcomings and limitations."
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, come on. We still have a long..."
links.text: "Now, come on. We still have a long day ahead of us."
links.title: You: "Climb down."
links.text: Climb down.
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, come on. It's getting late.""
links.text: "Now, come on. It's getting late."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But you made the *right* decision,..."
links.text: "But you made the *right* decision, the more difficult decision, in my mind, at least."
links.title: You: ""How do you know?""
links.text: "How do you know?"
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Because I can see you're still ago..."
links.text: "Because I can see you're still agonising over it. In my experience, when you make the wrong decision, you can tell right away. It's the right decisions that won't leave you alone..."
links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Perhaps someday the lieutenant will..."
links.text: Perhaps someday the lieutenant will tell you about some of the decisions that won't leave him alone, but it won't be this day.
links.title: You: ""Yeah, you're right.""
links.text: "Yeah, you're right."
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, I know..." The lieutenant all..."
links.text: "Yes, I know..." The lieutenant allows himself a sheepish half-smile. "In my experience, when you make the wrong decision, you can tell right away. It's the right decisions that won't leave you alone..."
links.title: You: ""I'm still not sure.""
links.text: "I'm still not sure."
links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You may feel that way for some tim..."
links.text: "You may feel that way for some time yet. In my experience, when you make the wrong decision, you can tell right away. It's the right decisions that won't leave you alone..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But you *did* accomplish your task..."
links.text: "But you *did* accomplish your task. You reached the Coalition. I must admit, I didn't seriously think you could do it, but you've proved me wrong."

links.title: You: ""I don't know. Maybe.""
links.text: "I don't know. Maybe."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not kidding, detective. It's t..."
links.text: "I'm not kidding, detective. It's time to come down."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "The lieutenant is right. There's re..."
links.text: The lieutenant is right. There's really nothing more for you up here.

links.title: You: "Climb down."
links.text: Climb down.

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Officer, we have a long walk back..."
links.text: "Officer, we have a long walk back to the church. It's time to come down."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "She's right. There's really nothing..."
links.text: She's right. There's really nothing more for you up here.

links.title: Noid: ""Come on. My leg's starting to twit..."
links.text: "Come on. My leg's starting to twitch. Means we've been here too long..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "He's right. There's really nothing..."
links.text: He's right. There's really nothing more for you up here.

links.title: You: "Climb down."
links.text: Climb down.

links.title: Volition: "There's really no point. You're beg..."
links.text: There's really no point. You're beginning to feel like the little child who refuses to come down off the carousel.

links.title: You: "Climb down."
links.text: Climb down.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "You look around. The strike breaker..."
links.text: You look around. The strike breakers are still shouting their slogans and waving their hand-painted signs. Beneath you, the speedfreak has begun disconnecting a few cables...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "The sun-warmed bronze tingles benea..."
links.text: The sun-warmed bronze tingles beneath your fingertips and between your thighs. Your legs have grown stiff. You've been up here quite a while.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "There's a damp cold running up the..."
links.text: There's a damp cold running up the insides of your thighs. Your legs have grown stiff. You've been up here quite a while.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "You look around. Most everyone has..."
links.text: You look around. Most everyone has already gone home for the night. It's really just you and the programmer left...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "You look around. Most everyone has..."
links.text: You look around. Most everyone has already gone home for the night. It's really just you and the speedfreak left...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "The cold bronze tickles your inner..."
links.text: The cold bronze tickles your inner thighs. Your legs have grown stiff. You've been up here quite a while.

links.title: You: ""I'm coming." (Climb down.)"
links.text: "I'm coming." (Climb down.)

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Good. Now, give me a hand with the..."
links.text: "Good. Now, give me a hand with these amplifiers. Leave the cables. I don't feel like making two trips..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "What's *one..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "What's *one more trip* across the waterlock?"

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Good. Now, give me a hand with the..."
links.text: "Good. Now, give me a hand with these amplifiers. Leave the cables. I don't feel like making two trips..."

links.title: Noid: ""About time. You grab that amp. For..."
links.text: "About time. You grab that amp. Forget the cables. Need to leave some evidence of our antenna to inspire future generations..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "What's *one..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "What's *one more trip* across the waterlock?"

links.title: Noid: ""About time. You grab that amp. For..."
links.text: "About time. You grab that amp. Forget the cables. Need to leave some evidence of our antenna to inspire future generations..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gives a long sigh as..."
links.text: The lieutenant gives a long sigh as he removes his headphones. He looks up at you.

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Hmm, what a disappointment. I was..."
links.text: "Hmm, what a disappointment. I was almost sure something *truly* interesting was about to happen. Oh well."

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""You can come down now, officer. I'..."
links.text: "You can come down now, officer. I'm going to begin packing my things up."

links.title: Noid: ""Took a dark turn there. Told you w..."
links.text: "Took a dark turn there. Told you we shouldn't have gone and aligned ourselves with the Big Bad. Gonna need some seriously hard core ablutions to wash this shit off..."

links.title: Noid: ""Now, come down here and give me a..."
links.text: "Now, come down here and give me a hand with this gear, would you?"

links.title: You: ""Sorry, I messed up and we ran out..."
links.text: "Sorry, I messed up and we ran out of time."

links.title: Noid: ""This is it: Final question time. I..."
links.text: "This is it: Final question time. I can already feel our alignment getting shaky..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Is everything alright? We lost the..."
links.text: "Is everything alright? We lost the connection for a moment..."

links.title: Empathy: "There is so much you wish you could..."
links.text: There is so much you wish you could ask, but you probably only have time for one or two questions before the signal is lost...

links.title: Interfacing: "You allow the broken hunk of metal..."
links.text: You allow the broken hunk of metal to clatter to the ground. It wasn't clear to you it did anything anyway...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Nein, Liebling!""
links.text: "Nein, Liebling!"

links.title: Noid: ""Huh. Sounds like that was a false..."
links.text: "Huh. Sounds like that was a false move. Signal's even worse now."

links.title: You: ""That piece of junk didn't even wor..."
links.text: "That piece of junk didn't even work!"

links.title: Noid: ""Probably because you broke it.""
links.text: "Probably because you broke it."

links.title: Empathy: "He's right. This was your responsib..."
links.text: He's right. This was your responsibility...

links.title: Noid: ""I'm going to turn all the dials to..."
links.text: "I'm going to turn all the dials to maximum. Probably gonna burn out our power supply, but that might be the only way..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "A maelstrom of sound, swirling and..."
links.text: A maelstrom of sound, swirling and swirling around an invisible point. It's mounting, mounting...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""... nicht mehr derselbe ist, seit..."
links.text: "... nicht mehr derselbe ist, seit er auf einem Luftschiff aus Graad zurückgekommen ist..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""... Firewalker? Please respond...""
links.text: "... Firewalker? Please respond..."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "It's too much! Your ear drums are t..."
links.text: It's too much! Your ear drums are throbbing, about to burst!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... a long winter... Long and cold..."
links.text: "... a long winter... Long and cold..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "... and then, nothing."
links.text: ... and then, nothing.

links.title: Noid: ""Try it now.""
links.text: "Try it now."

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer. This is..."
links.text: "Coalition Warship Archer. This is RCM Officer Firewalker. Please acknowledge."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "..."
Coalition Warship Archer: ""This is... Warship Archer. We are..."
links.text: "This is... Warship Archer. We are acknowledging and accepting you... though we're still getting quite a bit of interference..."

links.title: Noid: ""This is as good as it's going to g..."
links.text: "This is as good as it's going to get. I'll keep us aligned as long as I can, but this isn't a *social mission*, you got it?"

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry! I was trying to do good.""
links.text: "I'm sorry! I was trying to do good."

links.title: Noid: ""The thing is, trying's not enough...."
links.text: "The thing is, trying's not enough. Now it's the results that count."

links.title: You: ""It's not *my* fault the statue bro..."
links.text: "It's not *my* fault the statue broke."

links.title: Noid: ""Look, I'm not a blame-layer. I'm j..."
links.text: "Look, I'm not a blame-layer. I'm just saying, things were bad, and now they're worse."

links.title: Interfacing: "You allow the broken hunk of metal..."
links.text: You allow the broken hunk of metal to clatter to the ground. It wasn't clear to you it did anything anyway...

links.title: You: ""What good is that supposed to do?""
links.text: "What good is that supposed to do?"

links.title: Noid: ""Hmmm. Good question. Maybe he's sa..."
links.text: "Hmmm. Good question. Maybe he's saying we're casting too wide a net, got to *narrow our receiving band*, so we pick up the Big Bad without the spookers."

links.title: You: ""The connections are pretty dirty,..."
links.text: "The connections are pretty dirty, but I don't have anything to clean them with."

links.title: You: ""The connections look fine to me.""
links.text: "The connections look fine to me."

links.title: Noid: ""Huh. I don't know what to do then...."
links.text: "Huh. I don't know what to do then..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "The metal bar is cold and slick wit..."
links.text: The metal bar is cold and slick with precipitation. For a moment it feels as though you're about to slip, but you concentrate all your attention on your pectoral muscles and squeeze...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Don't forget the lats, champ! You'v..."
links.text: Don't forget the lats, champ! You've got this...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "The cold metal chills your bare han..."
links.text: The cold metal chills your bare hands. Some part of your brain tells you something is missing...

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Chalk powder. Absorbs moisture and..."
links.text: Chalk powder. Absorbs moisture and keeps your grip firm.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "... but before you can decide what,..."
links.text: ... but before you can decide what, you find yourself safely perched atop the monument.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "The cold metal chills your bare han..."
links.text: The cold metal chills your bare hands. Some part of your brain tells you something is missing...

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Chalk powder. Absorbs moisture and..."
links.text: Chalk powder. Absorbs moisture and keeps your grip firm.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "You don't exactly cut a lithesome f..."
links.text: You don't exactly cut a lithesome figure, but after several moments of scrambling you manage to hoist yourself atop the monument.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "That performance was, frankly, an e..."
links.text: That performance was, frankly, an embarrassment.

links.title: You: ""Maybe we should try again later?""
links.text: "Maybe we should try again later?"

links.title: Noid: ""No can do. This is it. The only wa..."
links.text: "No can do. This is it. The only way forward is the hard core way, straight through. Now give it another go."

links.title: You: "(Sigh.) "Coalition Warship Archer...."
links.text: (Sigh.) "Coalition Warship Archer. Do you acknowledge? This is Firewalker."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But someone has been maintaining i..."
links.text: "But someone has been maintaining it. The wiring has been repaired..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "..."
Horseback Antenna: ""... Walker? Please acknowledge.""
links.text: "... Walker? Please acknowledge."

links.title: You: ""Archer! This is Firewalker. Can yo..."
links.text: "Archer! This is Firewalker. Can you hear me?"

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einz..."
links.text: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""... Warship Archer. Please identif..."
links.text: "... Warship Archer. Please identify."

links.title: Interfacing: "The signals are getting increasingl..."
links.text: The signals are getting increasingly mixed. Plucking Archer's signal from this will be like isolating a single strand from a tangle of hair...

links.title: Noid: ""This isn't looking good."  The spe..."
links.text: "This isn't looking good."  The speedfreak removes his sweat-drenched headphones. "The radio-spookers are winning."

links.title: You: ""So what can we do about it?""
links.text: "So what can we do about it?"

links.title: Noid: ""You just have to embrace the spook..."
links.text: "You just have to embrace the spookiness. Now give it another go."

links.title: You: ""I've got a feeling this is related..."
links.text: "I've got a feeling this is related to the pale, some piece of the past that's mixing in with our signal."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's been a long winter... Long an..."
links.text: "It's been a long winter... Long and cold."

links.title: Noid: ""No telling, lawman. You ever confi..."
links.text: "No telling, lawman. You ever confirmed that he's, you know, *flesh and blood*?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, we've gone for an Ace's High..."
links.text: "Yeah, we've gone for an Ace's High before."

links.title: Noid: ""Sounds like some dark cop rituals...."
links.text: "Sounds like some dark cop rituals. Don't think I want to hear any more..."

links.title: You: ""I guess Kim's always had an *ether..."
links.text: "I guess Kim's always had an *ethereal* quality to him."

links.title: Noid: ""Could be he's your guardian spirit..."
links.text: "Could be he's your guardian spirit, your cop daemon..."

links.title: You: ""I'm going to continue believing th..."
links.text: "I'm going to continue believing that Kim's just hanging out on our connection."

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah, shut your ears to the truth...."
links.text: "Yeah, shut your ears to the truth. That's the safest way forward..."

links.title: You: ""Does that mean Kim's... *a ghost*?""
links.text: "Does that mean Kim's... *a ghost*?"

links.title: You: ""What is he talking about?""
links.text: "What is he talking about?"

links.title: Noid: ""There's no sense to it. It's just..."
links.text: "There's no sense to it. It's just spooker-talk."

links.title: You: ""I can't understand a word of this..."
links.text: "I can't understand a word of this gibberish."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einz..."
links.text: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen."

links.title: Noid: ""Me neither. Just keep trying. We'l..."
links.text: "Me neither. Just keep trying. We'll get through these radio-spookers eventually."

links.title: You: ""What's going on?""
links.text: "What's going on?"

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einz..."
links.text: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen."

links.title: Noid: ""Just radio-spookers. We get them a..."
links.text: "Just radio-spookers. We get them all the time around here. Keep trying."

links.title: You: "Keep listening."
links.text: Keep listening.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einz..."
links.text: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen."

links.title: Noid: ""Keep trying. We'll get through the..."
links.text: "Keep trying. We'll get through these radio-spookers eventually."

links.title: Rhetoric: "You can't make out a word of this g..."
links.text: You can't make out a word of this gibberish.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Nein, Liebling! ... unseren Jungen..."
links.text: "Nein, Liebling! ... unseren Jungen... nach Vredefort ... einem dieser *Dinger*..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "I-i-is there anybody th-th-there?"
links.text: I-i-is there anybody th-th-there?

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer, this is..."
links.text: "Coalition Warship Archer, this is RCM Officer Tequila Sunset. Please acknowledge."

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer, this is..."
links.text: "Coalition Warship Archer, this is Detective Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau of the RCM. Please acknowledge."

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer, this is..."
links.text: "Coalition Warship Archer, this is Lieutenant Harrier du Bois of the RCM. Please acknowledge."

links.title: Shivers: "A soft rustling. Between your ears,..."
links.text: A soft rustling. Between your ears, a winterscape with fast falling snow...

links.title: You: ""Hold on, I need a minute.""
links.text: "Hold on, I need a minute."

links.title: Noid: ""No time. We're live in two... one...."
links.text: "No time. We're live in two... one..."

links.title: You: ""Got it. Are we ready?""
links.text: "Got it. Are we ready?"
